document.full_text: the aging and erratic los angeles lakers faced an uncertain future on monday after the nba champions were embarrassingly swept out of the second round of the playoffs by the dallas mavericks.
document.title: cloudy future for lakers after premature playoff exit
lines_and_colors: the aging and erratic los angeles lakers faced an uncertain future on monday after the nba champions were embarrassingly swept out of the second round of the playoffs by the dallas mavericks.
